about_the_game:
Name: IMS Death Squad, Engine: Unreal Engine 4, Development Time: 1 Year ( 2022 ), Scale: Medium Scale.

STORY:

IMS Death Squad is A Third-Person Story-Telling Action Game. Its Story Takes place at the same time (2040) and same place (Gemstone Island - Advanced City) as the Original Super Incursion. You take control of IMS SERGEANT David Grimmes who is leader of IMS Death Squad team and brother of Marcelene Grimmes of the Original Super Incursion, 3 special forces teams are sent out to Advanced City to carry out Operation: Winter Strike by Incursion Military Service (IMS) and Gemstone Communist People's Ministry of Defense They are Specialized Force, Death Squad & Intelligence Corp. At The Start Of Operation: Winter Strike SERGEANT Grimmes Is alerted by one of his teammates that the whole Death Squad team is in danger, their superior officer COLONEL Sebastian Garrett has defected to the Con-Federation of Global Terrorism (CGT) and as part of his entry into the enemy side, He has been instructed by CGT High Ranking Senior Officer MAJOR Nickolai Patrikov, To give out Important sensitive IMS information, murder His entire team (Death Squad) and members of other teams to help sabotage Operation: Winter Strike as his requirements to be fully admitted into the Con-Federation of Global Terrorism, If he succeeds he will become CGT MAJOR 2nd Class, Be granted Lightning powers by CGT SUPREME GENERAL John Voorhies and be trained in sword fighting and martial arts. Now COLONEL Sebastian Garrett is working together with the CGT to sabotage Operation: Winter Strike and kill its participants.

GAMEPLAY:

IMS Death Squad is a shoot'em up action game, where the player has 2 rifles, a pistol and grenades, has to fight off enemies, solve puzzles and loot the world to survive. You start off with the G36C, UMP and USP45 as your primary weapons. The Player has to take cover, sprint away or temporary hide from enemies to regenerate health during gunfights. The environment is overgrown and is explorable with pickups to find, there are text logs explaining background story, medikits, ammo, pipebombs, molotovs, money and more to be found. Exploration is part of the gameplay loop and you have to explore to find resources to help you survive.

VEHICLE GAMEPLAY:

In IMS Death Squad SGT David Grimes will drive IMS Military Equipment from one point to another, This Military Equipment includes Quad Bikes.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES:

After Completing the game you can replay it in NEW GAME + Mode, You can use PERMA-DEATH MODE to increase the challenge and beating the game with this mode enabled, unlocks a golden star in the main menu. Tutorials, Aim Assist, Invert Mouse can be enabled and disabled in game settings.

IMS Death Squad has a beautiful but very dangerous world, where you have to save yourself and your teammates with your superior officer trying to kill you and prevent you from carrying out your Operation.

content_descriptors.notes: Enemies And Player Spilling Blood In Gunfights, On Screen Blood Hud Damage Indicators.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Mint 20.3
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 5th Generation
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 720TI
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Use Of An SSD As Opposed To An HDD

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7th Generation
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4000 HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8 & Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7th Generation
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 720TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Use Of An SSD As Opposed To An HDD, Microsoft Redistributable 2019, DirectX 9 (2010)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 & Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 5th Generation
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Use Of An SSD As Opposed To An HDD, Microsoft Redistributable 2019, DirectX 9 (2010)

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas

short_description: IMS Death Squad is A Third-Person Story-Telling Game. Its Story Takes Place In & Runs Parallel With The Original Super Incursion. IMS SGT David Grimmes Tries To Save Himself And His Team As Their Commander Has To Kill Them All, As A Requirement To Transition Into The Enemy Side.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Korean
*languages with full audio support
